profile.title: Profile
profile.bioDescription: This profile will be displayed when you publish extensions. Up to 150 characters.
profile.userIdDescription: You can change the unique ID used to identify the user. Changing it may cause bookmarked URLs to become unusable.

userIdDialog.title: Change User ID
userIdDialog.p1: You can change the unique ID used to identify the user.
userIdDialog.li1: After changing, you may not be able to revert to the original ID.
userIdDialog.li2: After changing, other users may use the original ID.
userIdDialog.li3: You will not be able to access your profile using the original ID.

email.title: Email Address
email.clickOnTheLink: Click on the link in the email we sent you to confirm your new email address.
email.emailSent: We have sent a link to change your email address

security.title: Security
security.name: Name
security.cannotRemoveAccount: This account cannot be removed because it will lose the sign-in method. Please verify your email address or add a sign-in method.

data.title: Personal Data

confirmationAccountDeletion.title: Confirmation of account deletion
confirmationAccountDeletion.body:
以下のリンクをクリックしてアカウントを削除できます


アカウントを削除

data.sentEmail: We have sent an email to confirm account deletion
